title: Pixel 4 XL Replacement Back Glass not stuck
content:
Dear Google,

I am on my 3rd Pixel 4 XL phone for display issues & back glass not glued (each one replaced via google support RMA and 899 euros frozen on my debit card).

The 3rd phone which I just this minute received also has the back glass which is not glued down.
Whoever is refurbishing the Pixel 4 XL for google is doing a terrible job in my opinion.

@Google, please reach out to me with a solution for this ?

Google support ticket number is 7-1262000030559

This is not acceptable !

Regards,
Mat
